name: Plutolife
overview:
A global leader in mobile community development and publishing of mobile content, Plutolifeâ€™s products generate high levels of recurring revenue through continuous and persistent end-user experience. Mobile social networking and user-generated content are Plutolifeâ€™s expertise.

History Established in 1999 Plutolifeâ€™s focus is mobile community platforms, community applications and mobile dating and chat applications.

Plutolife is the result of a June 2004 merger between Plutonium Software (established 1999) and Live the Game (established 2000) in Norway. Both companies were known as true pioneers in developing mass-market mobile entertainment. Live the Game’s success was in SMS-based games and dating services. This fused with Plutonium’s unique expertise in JAVA-games, set the stage for a powerhouse within the mobile entertainment industry.

Plutolife has over 8 years experience of managing communities in excess of 500,000 users ensuring usersâ€™ experience is fun, simple, exciting and safe.

Plutolife today is the developer of the worldâ€™s largest mobile dating platform that it publishes itself in Scandinavia and white labels for partners outside of Scandinavia.

The platform is currently connected and distributed successfully in 17 countries where active communities are managed and moderated to ensure the most pleasurable experience for all users.

Plutolife act as technology supplier to some of the worldâ€™s largest online dating brands and our technology today support the largest mobile dating platform in North America.

Today Plutolife continues to expand it global distribution and presence to all 4 corners of the globe, spanning 5 continents. Plutolife has firmly established itself as a leader in mobile community entertainment with numerous hit applications distributed through 70+ partnerships to date.

Expertise Plutolife is a pro in creating and delivering dating, flirting and mobile community entertainment that generates reoccurring revenue. Plutolife has a well-rounded approach to development and delivery that combines the best of technological know-how, end-user savvy and a sharp focus on the revenue line.

Plutolife is also home to some of the worldâ€™s top connected application Java gurus, having developed dozens of hit community mobile games and applications. Mobilove Java is one of Plutolifeâ€™s latest forays into Java and aims to set a new standard on what is capable with Java on a mobile phone. With Mobilove Java, Plutolife has finally perfected the optimal mobile dating experience.

Above development and delivery of itâ€™s own products, Plutolife has emerged as a master in mobile content distribution and delivery for third party vendors.
